alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:22PM CST until January 31 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Roads along Bayou Fuseilier are impassable. These include but are not limited to Walnut and Green roads along the St. Martin, St. Landry Parish line, as well as Meche Road in St. Landry Parish. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 17.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Bayou Vermilion Carencro 17.0 16.4 Sun 6 pm CST 17.2 15.2 13.0 &&
